decision_conditions: INFORMATIVE:  No permission is hereby granted for the proposed change to the bicycle and refuse/recycling enclosures.  Conditions 8 and 9 of the original planning permission state that the bicycle and refuse/recycling enclosures 'shall be carried out in accordance with the approved plans'.  As the proposed changes depart from the approved plans a separate section 73 application must be made for the council's formal consideration should you wish to pursue the changes.
